Festival of Lights (Niagara Falls)
  Sponsored by


provided by


Festival of Lights (Niagara Falls)
5515 Stanley Ave
Toronto , ON , L2G 3X4
Tel: +1 905 356 6061

Coinciding with the onset of winter, the popular tourist destination of Niagara Falls comes alive with stunning lighting arrays and Walt Disney motion light displays— and the "honeymoon capital" of North America becomes a wintry festival of lights for all to see. This celebration brings cold-weather tourists to a town previously known for summer fun. With the Falls frozen into an icy array, this bright-light spectacle is for the curious and the romantic. After the lights go out, there is still plenty to do, including the well-lit 24-hour Casino Niagara.
